audioText: Le stress chronique peut avoir des effets néfastes sur notre corps et notre bien-être général.
question: What does the speaker say about chronic stress?
options: It can have harmful effects on our body and general well-being.
It helps improve our physical performance.
It has no significant impact on health.
It only affects our mental state, not physical health.
explanation: The speaker states 'Le stress chronique peut avoir des effets néfastes sur notre corps et notre bien-être général' - Chronic stress can have harmful effects on our body and general well-being. This emphasizes the physical impact of prolonged stress on the human body.
